name: Indiana Jones® and the Infernal Machine™
description: The year is 1947. The Nazis have been crushed, the Cold War has begun and Soviet agents are sniffing around the ruins of the fabled Tower of Babel. What are they up to? The CIA recruits renowned archeologist and adventurer, Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, to find out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c and 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
